```{r}
a = 2
b = 5
r1 = a+b
r2 = a-b
r3 = a*b
r4 = a/b
v1 = c(r1,r2,r3,r4)
r5 = a**b
v1 = c(v1, r5)
print(v1)
v2 = c("sum", "difference", "product", "ratio", "power")

df = data.frame(v1,v2)
colnames(df) <- c("Results", "Operation")
print(df)
df[3,1]
```
